"Make sure you've entered the correct code"
Phone number verification is provided by Yellow pages. Yellow pages needs to connect to the network to work normally. Agree?
"Yellow pages won't be able to track delivery info automatically after you delete the phone number. Delete anyway?"
Verify your phone number to check order details.
